meanings.definition: A type of lipoprotein that transports dietary fats from the intestines to other parts of the body.
meanings.sent1: After eating a meal, the chylomicron carries the fats to different areas of the body.
meanings.sent2: Doctors study how the chylomicron moves fats around the body after digestion.
meanings.sent3: The chylomicron decided to take a scenic route through the body, enjoying the sights along the way.
meanings.sent4: Like a tiny fat taxi, the chylomicron shuttles its passengers to various destinations in the body.
meanings.sent5: Imagine the chylomicron as a tiny delivery truck, dropping off fats wherever they are needed.

meanings.definition: A large, spherical particle composed of triglycerides, phospholipids, cholesterol, and proteins.
meanings.sent1: Under the microscope, the chylomicron appeared as a round structure filled with different substances.
meanings.sent2: Scientists are fascinated by the composition of the chylomicron and its role in the body.
meanings.sent3: The chylomicron threw a party with all the different molecules it carried inside.
meanings.sent4: In the bloodstream, the chylomicron resembled a tiny planet made of fats and proteins.
meanings.sent5: The chylomicron looked like a miniature world, with its own unique blend of lipids and proteins.
